data.title: BTC/USD Supported with Technical Bids on Pullbacks: Sally Ho's Technical Analysis 24 March 2022 BTC
data.text: Bitcoin (BTC/USD) attempted to retain some of the recent gains early in the Asian session as the pair orbited the 42000 figure after trading as high as the 43389.79 level, a test of the 78.6% retracement of the depreciating range from 45855 to 34322.   Technical bids emerged above the 41949 area after BTC/USD escalated to the 43389 area, a level that represents the 50% retracement of the recent appreciating range from 40509 to 43389.79, and technical bids around the 38.2% retracement level later kept the pair bid around the 42289 area.

data.title: What does Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) 4844 bring to the table?
data.text: Last week, Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin tweeted a technical FAQ for EIP-4844 – also known as “proto-danksharding.” In short, this proposal will initiate a more efficient way to organize data logistics to support high transaction throughput.
